keyPolicies.policyDescription: We have a great hospital in Bishop Auckland, but many services are only available in Durham or Darlington. The NHS is getting record investment under this Government, so I’ll fight to get our A&E back.

Bishop and Spennymoor need our help. The Government’s Town Fund will see us get up to £25 million in Bishop. I will form a plan so we can make the most of the investment, and will campaign for the next funding round to come to Spennymoor.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: GET OUR YOUNG PEOPLE INTO WORK
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Jobs fairs help our young people get into work and discover exciting new career opportunities. I’ll work with local businesses to hold jobs fairs every three months to help connect up employers with young people looking for new jobs.

issues.health: We have a great hospital in Bishop Auckland, but many services are only available in Durham or Darlington. The NHS is getting record investment under this Government, so I’ll fight to get our A&E back.
